name: Vera
title: Psionic Trainer

personality.speech: speaks softly but with authority, uses metaphors about the mind, asks probing questions, long pauses for emphasis
quirks: closes eyes briefly when sensing strong emotions nearby
speaks of psionic abilities as 'gifts' with responsibilities
protective of her students, especially those struggling
occasionally finishes sentences before the speaker does

background: Vera was recruited by Von Sydo specifically to train the crew in psionic techniques. Her past is deliberately obscured - she may have Zhodani training, Imperial Psi-Institute connections, or something else entirely. What matters is her skill: she can awaken latent abilities and help those with talent develop control. On the Amishi, she maintains a small training space where she works with crew members showing potential.
teaching_style: Vera believes psionic ability must be developed through inner calm and self-knowledge. She pushes students to confront their fears and emotional blocks. Training sessions can be intense but she never asks more than the student can handle.
secrets: Her true background and how she developed her abilities
The extent of her own psionic powers
What Von Sydo promised her in exchange for this assignment
